trans-unit.resname: your life,
trans-unit.source: your life,
trans-unit.target: nella tua vita,

trans-unit.resname: it is bound to leave an indelible mark
trans-unit.source: it is bound to leave an indelible mark
trans-unit.target: è destinata a lasciare un segno indelebile

trans-unit.resname: Zamua was born in Sardinia to a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father. He is a singer, guitarist, and songwriter.
trans-unit.source: Zamua was born in Sardinia to a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father. He is a singer, guitarist, and songwriter.
trans-unit.target: Zamua è un cantante, chitarrista e songwriter nato in Sardegna da madre sarda e da padre burundese.

trans-unit.resname: His dream was to become a footballer, but he found himself bedridden after an accident on the football field. During his convalescence, his friend Deodatus Nduwimana taught him how to play the guitar. "I just wanted to learn the Redemption Song, Bob Marley was my hero."
trans-unit.source: His dream was to become a footballer, but he found himself bedridden after an accident on the football field. During his convalescence, his friend Deodatus Nduwimana taught him how to play the guitar. "I just wanted to learn the Redemption Song, Bob Marley was my hero."
trans-unit.target: Il suo sogno era diventare un calciatore, ma si ritrova immobilizzato a letto in seguito a un incidente sul campo da calcio. Durante la convalescenza il suo amico Deodatus Nduwimana gli insegna a suonare la chitarra. « Volevo semplicemente imparare Redemption Song, Bob Marley era il mio eroe ».

trans-unit.resname:
"The first time I sang in front of someone, I was seven years old. It was in front of my family. I did something that vaguely sounded like rap music.
There was no rap music being played at home; in fact, I'm still not sure where I got that powerful music from...
My father often listened to jazz radio shows. I recall Louis Armstrong's trumpet playing in the mornings while we ate breakfast, as well as the vocals of Ladysmith Black Mambazo, Tracy Chapman, Luigi Tenco, Lucio Dalla, and Fabrizio De André.
Today, when I listen to the recording of that first so-called performance, I understand that when the music hits, it leaves an indelible mark... "
trans-unit.source:
"The first time I sang in front of someone, I was seven years old. It was in front of my family. I did something that vaguely sounded like rap music.
There was no rap music being played at home; in fact, I'm still not sure where I got that powerful music from...
My father often listened to jazz radio shows. I recall Louis Armstrong's trumpet playing in the mornings while we ate breakfast, as well as the vocals of Ladysmith Black Mambazo, Tracy Chapman, Luigi Tenco, Lucio Dalla, and Fabrizio De André.
Today, when I listen to the recording of that first so-called performance, I understand that when the music hits, it leaves an indelible mark... "
trans-unit.target:
"La prima volta che cantai davanti alla mia famiglia avevo sette anni. Feci qualcosa che somigliava vagamente a un rap.

Mio padre ascoltava spesso il jazz su Radio Rai 3. Mi ricordo la tromba di Louis Amstrong la mattina, mentre facevamo colazione, le voci dei Ladysmith Black Mambazo, di Tracy Chapman, di Luigi Tenco, di Lucio Dalla e di Fabrizio De André.
Oggi, quando riascolto la registrazione di quella prima performance, capisco che quando la musica colpisce, lascia un segno indelebile..."

trans-unit.resname: This sensation endures until one realizes that the greatest way to appreciate music is to create it, to bring it to life...
trans-unit.source: This sensation endures until one realizes that the greatest way to appreciate music is to create it, to bring it to life...
trans-unit.target: Questa sensazione resta intatta col passare del tempo, finché non realizzi che il modo migliore per vivere la musica è farla, vederla nascere…

trans-unit.source: BIOGRAPHY
trans-unit.target: BIOGRAFIA

trans-unit.source: LITANIE
trans-unit.target: LITANIE

trans-unit.resname: LITANIE is Zamua's first EP, produced by the young independent label OD MusicLab. His debut mini-album is a unique blend of ecstatic feelings and litanies,making it hard to categorize his art form yet essential to know about.
trans-unit.source: LITANIE is Zamua's first EP, produced by the young independent label OD MusicLab. His debut mini-album is a unique blend of ecstatic feelings and litanies,making it hard to categorize his art form yet essential to know about.
trans-unit.target: LITANIE é il primo EP di Zamua, prodotto dalla giovane etichetta indipendente OD MusicLab. Il suo mini-album d’esordio offre un’immersione musicale atipica tra euforie e litanie, e fa di questo artista un elemento inclassificabile ma indispensabile.

trans-unit.resname: BIOGRAPHY
trans-unit.source: BIOGRAPHY
trans-unit.target: BIOGRAFIA

trans-unit.resname: Zamua is a guitarist, singer, and songwriter. He was born in Sardinia to a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father.
trans-unit.source: Zamua is a guitarist, singer, and songwriter. He was born in Sardinia to a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father.
trans-unit.target: Zamua è un cantante, chitarrista e songwriter nato in Sardegna da madre sarda e da padre burundese.

trans-unit.resname: His interest in singing and playing the guitar began almost by chance, during a long period of convalescence that saw him bedridden. Since then Zamua has devoted himself to music and literature, establishing a unique and thrilling combination of folk and soul-jazz, crossing over between analog and electronic music. A hybrid outcome in which words'power are crucial.
trans-unit.source: His interest in singing and playing the guitar began almost by chance, during a long period of convalescence that saw him bedridden. Since then Zamua has devoted himself to music and literature, establishing a unique and thrilling combination of folk and soul-jazz, crossing over between analog and electronic music. A hybrid outcome in which words'power are crucial.
trans-unit.target: Inizia l’approccio al canto e alla chitarra quasi per caso, da adolescente, durante un lungo periodo di convalescenza che lo vede costretto a letto. Da allora, Zamua si dedica alla musica e alla scrittura sviluppando un intreccio personale e emozionante tra folk e soul-jazz, lungo una linea di confine tra l’analogico e l’elettronico. Un risultato meticcio in cui la narrazione e la forza della parola sono essenziali.

trans-unit.resname: Continuous exploration of his various musical styles, including soul, blues, folk, jazz, and reggae.
trans-unit.source: Continuous exploration of his various musical styles, including soul, blues, folk, jazz, and reggae.
trans-unit.target: Un continuo percorso esplorativo delle sue diverse identità musicali, tra vibrazioni soul, blues, folk, jazz, reggae.

trans-unit.resname: He formed his first band in 1996, in his hometown, Canta'nde Reggae with friends Mastrone (S. Piras) on vocal and F. Ortu on drums, M.Masala on keyboards, L.Devito on transverse flute, G.Demontis on bass, M.Barubiriza, M. Carroni and P. Musina on backing vocals, AbuMar on percussion. Zamua himself played guitar and vocals. Canta'nde Reggae lived between cellars and garages, in a context of artistic and creative ferment that gave birth to various groups and musical realities reggae, jazz, rock, punk, ska, rap (Vok Rebelde, Seditio Plebeia, SMP, Menarka, Cosca Smeralda Quartet, Reggae Realidad ...). All were underground realities which expanded through communication, feeding, and stimulating one another. During this time, the nickname Zamua was derived.
trans-unit.source: He formed his first band in 1996, in his hometown, Canta'nde Reggae with friends Mastrone (S. Piras) on vocal and F. Ortu on drums, M.Masala on keyboards, L.Devito on transverse flute, G.Demontis on bass, M.Barubiriza, M. Carroni and P. Musina on backing vocals, AbuMar on percussion. Zamua himself played guitar and vocals. Canta'nde Reggae lived between cellars and garages, in a context of artistic and creative ferment that gave birth to various groups and musical realities reggae, jazz, rock, punk, ska, rap (Vok Rebelde, Seditio Plebeia, SMP, Menarka, Cosca Smeralda Quartet, Reggae Realidad ...). All were underground realities which expanded through communication, feeding, and stimulating one another. During this time, the nickname Zamua was derived.
trans-unit.target: Nel 1996, forma con Mastrone (S. Piras) il suo primo gruppo Canta’nde Reggae (F. Ortu alla batteria, M.Masala alle tastiere, L.Devito al flauto traverso, G.Demontis al basso, M.Barubiriza, M. Carroni, P.Musina ai cori, AbuMar alle Percussioni, Mastrone alla voce e Zamua alla chitarra e voce), a Nuoro, tra cantine e garage, in un contesto di fermento artistico e creativo che vedeva il formarsi di diversi gruppi e realtà musicali reggae, jazz, rock, punk, ska, rap (Vok Rebelde, Seditio Plebeia, SMP, Menarka, Cosca Smeralda Quartet, Reggae Realidad…). Tutte realtà underground che crescevano comunicando tra loro, alimentandosi e stimolandosi a vicenda. In questo periodo nasce il soprannome Zamua.

trans-unit.resname: Music became part of his life almost as a necessity, enabling him to build a bridge between his different roots. Zamua, always driven by a deep and intimate search, embarks on a trip with his guitar and his voice.
trans-unit.source: Music became part of his life almost as a necessity, enabling him to build a bridge between his different roots. Zamua, always driven by a deep and intimate search, embarks on a trip with his guitar and his voice.
trans-unit.target: La musica entra a far parte della sua vita quasi come una necessità, il bisogno di costruire un ponte tra le sue diverse radici. Sempre alla ricerca di sé, Zamua parte in viaggio in compagnia della sua chitarra e della sua voce.

trans-unit.resname:
A unique combination
of folk and soul-jazz
trans-unit.source:
A unique combination
of folk and soul-jazz
trans-unit.target:
Un intreccio personale
tra folk e soul-jazz

trans-unit.resname: He relocated to Naples, enrolled in university, and simultaneously launched the reggae-influenced musical band called Metisse. Zamua continued his melting sound explorations with Metisse (A. Rubano on bass, V. Ciorra on guitar, M. Barubiriza and N. Rubano on backing vocals, D. Leone on drums, E. Capasso on keyboards, R. Crispino on percussion, and Zamua on guitar and vocals). "Metisse," indicated and foreshadowed the significance of fusion to his style, as well as the significance of always seeking new methods to combine music and various aesthetic inspirations.
trans-unit.source: He relocated to Naples, enrolled in university, and simultaneously launched the reggae-influenced musical band called Metisse. Zamua continued his melting sound explorations with Metisse (A. Rubano on bass, V. Ciorra on guitar, M. Barubiriza and N. Rubano on backing vocals, D. Leone on drums, E. Capasso on keyboards, R. Crispino on percussion, and Zamua on guitar and vocals). "Metisse," indicated and foreshadowed the significance of fusion to his style, as well as the significance of always seeking new methods to combine music and various aesthetic inspirations.
trans-unit.target: Approda a Napoli, dove inizia gli studi universitari e fonda, in parallelo, Metisse, un progetto musicale dalla marcata impronta reggae roots. Con Metisse (A.Rubano al basso, V.Ciorra alla chitarra, M.Barubiriza e N.Rubano ai cori, D.Leone alla batteria, E.Capasso alle tastiere, R.Crispino alle percussioni e Zamua alla chitarra e voce) , Zamua continua le sue esperienze sonore meticce. Il nome stesso del progetto, Metisse, spiega e anticipa l’importanza che la fusione ricopre nella sua estetica e il bisogno di una ricerca costante di commistioni musicali e contaminazioni multiformi.

trans-unit.resname: In 2003, Zamua began working on a new project called ElephantAndCastle, co-founded with a keyboard player and producer Alessandro Capasso (Collettivo Cerchi e Xhu): ElephantAndCastle. "ElephantAndCastle" consists of the following members; (A. Capasso on keyboards, programming and vocals, D. Sorrentino on bass, C. D'Avino on drums, R. Crispino on percussion and Zamua on guitar and vocals). An afro-jazz project, whose real "raison d'être" was the fusion of genres.
trans-unit.source: In 2003, Zamua began working on a new project called ElephantAndCastle, co-founded with a keyboard player and producer Alessandro Capasso (Collettivo Cerchi e Xhu): ElephantAndCastle. "ElephantAndCastle" consists of the following members; (A. Capasso on keyboards, programming and vocals, D. Sorrentino on bass, C. D'Avino on drums, R. Crispino on percussion and Zamua on guitar and vocals). An afro-jazz project, whose real "raison d'être" was the fusion of genres.
trans-unit.target: Nel 2003, Zamua inizia a lavorare a un nuovo progetto co-fondato con il tastierista e produttore Alessandro Capasso (Collettivo Cerchi e Xhu) : ElephantAndCastle (A.Capasso alle tastiere, programming e voce, D.Sorrentino al basso, C.D’Avino alla batteria, R.Crispino alle percussioni e Zamua alla chitarra e voce). Un progetto d’impronta afro-jazz, la cui vera ragione d'essere è la fusione di generi.

trans-unit.resname: Zamua's passion for experimentation took more and more shape and space within his creative and writing process.
trans-unit.source: Zamua's passion for experimentation took more and more shape and space within his creative and writing process.
trans-unit.target: La passione per la sperimentazione prende sempre più forma e spazio nel processo creativo e di scrittura di Zamua.

trans-unit.resname: After a "brief" interlude of six months each in both Tanzania and Egypt, in 2006 Zamua relocated to Paris, France where he pursued his studies in Sociology of Migration He became interested in international laws related to foreign rights and asylum protection, therefore he began working with organizations that assist asylum seekers in navigating the complex legal and bureaucratic procedures required to obtain refugee status.
trans-unit.source: After a "brief" interlude of six months each in both Tanzania and Egypt, in 2006 Zamua relocated to Paris, France where he pursued his studies in Sociology of Migration He became interested in international laws related to foreign rights and asylum protection, therefore he began working with organizations that assist asylum seekers in navigating the complex legal and bureaucratic procedures required to obtain refugee status.
trans-unit.target: Dopo una “breve” parentesi di 6 mesi in Tanzania e di 6 mesi in Egitto, nel 2006, Zamua approda in Francia, a Parigi, dove prosegue i suoi studi di Sociologia delle migrazioni. Si interessa al diritto degli stranieri e al diritto d’asilo e inizia a lavorare con associazioni che accompagnano i richiedenti asilo nelle difficili procedure giuridiche e amministrative volte al riconoscimento dello status di rifugiato.

trans-unit.resname: It was in Paris that Zamua's solo project took form.
trans-unit.source: It was in Paris that Zamua's solo project took form.
trans-unit.target: Qui prende forma il progetto solista di Zamua.

trans-unit.resname: He continued writing and performing live in various cultural spaces, Bars, etc in the French capital. His initiative is fueled by encounters and friendships, which contribute to its development. It was crucial to his journey that he met and collaborated artistically with producer and sound designer Shay Mané, sound engineer Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling, and photographer and artistic director Chloé Dupeyrat (Acidulée Production) during this period.
trans-unit.source: He continued writing and performing live in various cultural spaces, Bars, etc in the French capital. His initiative is fueled by encounters and friendships, which contribute to its development. It was crucial to his journey that he met and collaborated artistically with producer and sound designer Shay Mané, sound engineer Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling, and photographer and artistic director Chloé Dupeyrat (Acidulée Production) during this period.
trans-unit.target: Continua la scrittura e le performance live nei club della capitale francese. Gli incontri e le amicizie danno slancio e contribuiscono a far maturare il suo progetto. In questo periodo, l'incontro e la collaborazione artistica con l’artista e produttore Shay Mané, l'ingegnere del suono Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling e la fotografa-direttrice artistica Chloé Dupeyrat (Acidulée Production) è stato significativo nel suo percorso.

trans-unit.resname:
Identity, migration, racism, the physical and spiritual journey are central topics in his music being a source of inspiration, and an essential matter for his work and inner reflection.
The distancing from what is stable and firm, the idea of a sacred journey envelops most of his songs. Without ever stating it explicitly, his songs reveal a complex tale about how people relate to one another and how events impact their emotions and experiences.
trans-unit.source:
Identity, migration, racism, the physical and spiritual journey are central topics in his music being a source of inspiration, and an essential matter for his work and inner reflection.
The distancing from what is stable and firm, the idea of a sacred journey envelops most of his songs. Without ever stating it explicitly, his songs reveal a complex tale about how people relate to one another and how events impact their emotions and experiences.
trans-unit.target:
L’identità, la migrazione, il razzismo, il viaggio fisico e spirituale sono temi che trovano ampio spazio nella sua musica, come fonte di ispirazione e materia su cui lavorare e riflettere.
L’allontanamento da ciò che è stabile e fermo, il profumo del viaggio avvolgono la maggior parte delle sue canzoni. I suoi testi, senza mai rifarsi apertamente all’autobiografia, raccontano una complessa trama di relazioni umane e connessioni emotive tra le cose ed il vissuto.

trans-unit.resname: The result is music made of mixtures and connections, which led Zamua to meet and collaborate with Raffaele Casarano, Flavio Boltro, and Paolo Fresu, among others from the national and international jazz scene.
trans-unit.source: The result is music made of mixtures and connections, which led Zamua to meet and collaborate with Raffaele Casarano, Flavio Boltro, and Paolo Fresu, among others from the national and international jazz scene.
trans-unit.target: Nasce una musica fatta di commistioni e di aperture che portano Zamua a incontrare e a collaborare con altri artisti della scena jazz nazionale e internazionale come Raffaele Casarano, Flavio Boltro e Paolo Fresu.

trans-unit.resname: Shay Mané and Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling, who work for the OD MusicLab record label, assisted him in creating his debut EP, Litanie.
trans-unit.source: Shay Mané and Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling, who work for the OD MusicLab record label, assisted him in creating his debut EP, Litanie.
trans-unit.target: L’etichetta OD MusicLab (Shay Mané e Fabrice Ho-Shui-Ling) lo accompagna nella produzione del suo primo EP dal titolo Litanie.

trans-unit.resname:
A borderline
between analogue and electronica
trans-unit.source:
A borderline
between analogue and electronica
trans-unit.target:
Una linea di confine
tra l'analogico e l'elettronico

trans-unit.source: Cookies
trans-unit.target: Cookies

trans-unit.resname: Our website uses cookies: some small text files that are sent to your terminal during your visit.
trans-unit.source: Our website uses cookies: some small text files that are sent to your terminal during your visit.
trans-unit.target: Il nostro sito utlizza i cookies : dei piccoli file testo che vengono inviati al vostro terminale durante la vostra visita.

trans-unit.resname: These text files are used to make your browsing experience on the site more efficient.
trans-unit.source: These text files are used to make your browsing experience on the site more efficient.
trans-unit.target: Questi file testo vengono utilizzati per rendere più efficente l'esperienza di navigazione sul sito dell'utente

trans-unit.resname: The cookies used are "technical cookies", i.e. they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. Users' prior consent is not required for the installation and use of technical cookies, as the data managed by the session or navigation cookies are used for the sole purpose of checking and guaranteeing the correct functioning of the service offered or to obtain anonymous statistical information on the use of the website.
trans-unit.source: The cookies used are "technical cookies", i.e. they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. Users' prior consent is not required for the installation and use of technical cookies, as the data managed by the session or navigation cookies are used for the sole purpose of checking and guaranteeing the correct functioning of the service offered or to obtain anonymous statistical information on the use of the website.
trans-unit.target: I cookies utilizzati sono, "cookies tecnici" ovvero strettamente necessari per il funzionamento di questo sito. Per l'installazione e l'utilizzo dei cookie tecnici non è richiesto il preventivo consenso degli utenti, poiché i dati gestiti dai cookie di sessione o navigazione vengono utilizzati al solo fine di controllare e garantire il corretto funzionamento del servizio offerto o per ricavare informazioni statistiche anonime sull'uso del sito.

trans-unit.resname: Deactivate cookies
trans-unit.source: Deactivate cookies
trans-unit.target: Disattivare i cookies

trans-unit.resname: The User can control his or her choices regarding the use of cookies generally through the settings on his or her browser, through which he or she can decide to make the installation of any type of cookie subject to his or her prior consent or to prevent its installation completely. You are invited to visit the section on cookie settings provided by your browser (Google Chrome, Safari, Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer).
trans-unit.source: The User can control his or her choices regarding the use of cookies generally through the settings on his or her browser, through which he or she can decide to make the installation of any type of cookie subject to his or her prior consent or to prevent its installation completely. You are invited to visit the section on cookie settings provided by your browser (Google Chrome, Safari, Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer).
trans-unit.target: L'utente puo controllare le proprie scelte sull'utilizzo dei cookies ingenerale tramite le impostazioni del proprio browser, attraverso le quali può decidere di subordinare l’installazione di qualsiasi tipo di cookie al proprio consenso preventivo o di impedirne completamente l’installazione. Si invita l’Utente a visitare la rubrica relativa alle impostazioni dei cookies messa a disposizione dal proprio broser (Google Chrome, Safari, Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer).

trans-unit.resname: Privacy POLICY
trans-unit.source: Privacy POLICY
trans-unit.target: Privacy POLICY

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: Introduzione

trans-unit.resname: We consider the protection and respect of your privacy to be of paramount importance. We are therefore committed to respecting the confidentiality of your personal data and to ensuring that they are processed ethically and in full compliance with the regulations in force.
trans-unit.source: We consider the protection and respect of your privacy to be of paramount importance. We are therefore committed to respecting the confidentiality of your personal data and to ensuring that they are processed ethically and in full compliance with the regulations in force.
trans-unit.target: Noi consideriamo di foncadmentale importanza la tutela e il rispetto della privacy dell'utente. Pertanto, ci impegniamo a rispettare la riservatezza dei dati personali e a garantire un trattamento etico e nel pieno rispetto delle norme vigenti.

trans-unit.source: We are committed to collecting only the data that are necessary in relation to the purpose for which they are collected (see next part):
trans-unit.target: Ci impegniamo a raccogliere solo i dati che sono necessari in relazione al fine per il quale vengono raccolti (vedere la parte successiva) :

trans-unit.resname: User's rights

trans-unit.target: I diritti dell'utente

trans-unit.resname: According to current legislation, each user has the right to access, update, rectify, delete and limit the use of their personal data. The user can exercise this right by contacting our service: personal.data@zamuamusic.com
trans-unit.source: According to current legislation, each user has the right to access, update, rectify, delete and limit the use of their personal data. The user can exercise this right by contacting our service: personal.data@zamuamusic.com
trans-unit.target: Secondo la legislazione vigente, ogni utente ha il diritto di accesso, di aggiornamento, di retifica, di cancellazione e il diritto di limitare l'uso dei suoi dati personali. L'utente puo esercitare il proprio diritto contattando il nostro servizio: personal.data@zamuamusic.com

trans-unit.resname: Music comes from a sense of urgency, from a need to share one's voice, soul, and presence. A means of learning to think critically about what we see and do in the environment in which we live; the beginning and end of a cyclical path toward self-determination. It is a means of reaching people's emotions, conveying a picture, an idea, or a concept, and giving meaning to the perception of reality.
trans-unit.source: Music comes from a sense of urgency, from a need to share one's voice, soul, and presence. A means of learning to think critically about what we see and do in the environment in which we live; the beginning and end of a cyclical path toward self-determination. It is a means of reaching people's emotions, conveying a picture, an idea, or a concept, and giving meaning to the perception of reality.
trans-unit.target: La musica è urgenza e necessità impellente di condivisione della propria voce, della propria anima, della propria presenza. Uno strumento per sviluppare un senso critico sulla nostra esperienza nella società in cui viviamo; è il principio e la fine di un percorso ciclico verso l’autodeterminazione. Un mezzo per toccare il cuore delle persone, per comunicare un’immagine, un’idea, un concetto, per dare un senso alla percezione della realtà.

trans-unit.resname: Music builds bridges between the inner and outer worlds. It allows us to put into a delicate shape the inexplicable inner secrets that occasionally manage to escape via the melodies and rhythm.
trans-unit.source: Music builds bridges between the inner and outer worlds. It allows us to put into a delicate shape the inexplicable inner secrets that occasionally manage to escape via the melodies and rhythm.
trans-unit.target: La musica crea un ponte tra il mondo interiore e il mondo esteriore. Permette di tradurre in forma sensibile, i segreti dell’anima, segreti che neanche noi stessi sappiamo spiegare ma che a volte riescono a fuoriuscire attraverso le note.

trans-unit.resname: "When it comes to music, I go into a tizzy. It's something I've done since I was a youngster. Through music, and particularly through singing, I can investigate and reflect on topics that are important to me such as identity, or rather our identities, which are fluid, changing, and never the same, in a way that dismantles any concept of a real or imagined line between "us" and "them.
trans-unit.source: "When it comes to music, I go into a tizzy. It's something I've done since I was a youngster. Through music, and particularly through singing, I can investigate and reflect on topics that are important to me such as identity, or rather our identities, which are fluid, changing, and never the same, in a way that dismantles any concept of a real or imagined line between "us" and "them.
trans-unit.target: “Vivo la musica in modo quasi maniacale, la faccio da quando ero ragazzino. Attraverso la musica, e in modo particolare attraverso il canto, riesco a intraprendere un percorso di ricerca e di riflessione su questioni per me centrali come l’identità, o meglio, le nostre identità, fluide, mutevoli, mai identiche a se stesse, in un movimento che annienta ogni idea di confine fisico e immaginario tra il “Noi” e il “Loro”.

trans-unit.resname: "Music has been and still is, a fundamental element of my existence. There is no predefined musical genre. I start with two instruments, voice and guitar. And then begin developing, creating, and telling stories. The foundation of my musical universes, such as soul, jazz, reggae, and electronic music are all incorporated into my work. I allowed myself to be burdened by this baggage, and as a result, I produced extremely hybrid music"
trans-unit.source: "Music has been and still is, a fundamental element of my existence. There is no predefined musical genre. I start with two instruments, voice and guitar. And then begin developing, creating, and telling stories. The foundation of my musical universes, such as soul, jazz, reggae, and electronic music are all incorporated into my work. I allowed myself to be burdened by this baggage, and as a result, I produced extremely hybrid music"
trans-unit.target: "La Musica è stata, lo è tuttora, un elemento fondamentale della mia esistenza. Non esiste un genere musicale, parto dai miei due strumenti, la voce e la chitarra. E da li inizio a lavorare, a costruire, a raccontare una storia. Cerco di dare forma a un'estetica, la trama di un viaggio tra i miei universi musicali quali il soul, il jazz, il reggae, la musica elettronica…. Mi lascio attraversare da questo bagaglio per poi far nascere brani profondamente ibridi.”

trans-unit.source: Credits
trans-unit.target: Crediti

trans-unit.resname: Zamua is a singer, guitarist, and songwriter. He was born in Sardinia to a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father.
trans-unit.source: Zamua is a singer, guitarist, and songwriter. He was born in Sardinia to a Sardinian mother and a Burundian father.
trans-unit.target: Zamua è un cantante, chitarrista e songwriter nato in Sardegna da madre sarda e da padre burundese.

trans-unit.resname: Currently, Zamua lives between France and Italy and he is working on his first album.
trans-unit.source: Currently, Zamua lives between France and Italy and he is working on his first album.
trans-unit.target: Attualmente, Zamua vive tra la Francia e l'Italia e sta scrivendo il suo primo album.
